author: joeswatosh
msg: Make :target_revision argument optional instead of required for
:target_revision an optional instead of required argument.

author: kfogel
msg: Finish what r27831 started: only take wc adm locks as deeply as needed.
(Hey, I know it's not 1.5 work, but I had some time on an airplane!)
(SVN_WC__LEVELS_TO_LOCK_FROM_DEPTH): New macro, from a function that's...
(levels_to_lock_from_depth): ...now removed in favor of the above macro.
(svn_client__update_internal): Same, and adjust a comment so that
it isn't dependent on the old code for comprehensibility.

author: lgo
msg: Starting from version 0.1.3 serf will handle the situation where the server is
telling us it will close the connection.
handle_response): Make the check to see of the server is going to close the
connection conditional based on the version of serf.
